tool_description: The World Time Zones API is your gateway to accurate and up-to-date time zone information from around the globe. With three user-friendly endpoints, this API simplifies the process of accessing time zone data. Whether you need to retrieve random time zones, look up a specific time zone by its short code, or explore time zones by country or location, this API offers a seamless and comprehensive solution. All responses are provided in JSON format, making integration with your application a breeze.
name: World Time Zones API
title: World Time Zones API

api_list.name: Get Time Zones By Location
api_list.description:
**Endpoint: /api/v1/location?location=<COUNTRY or LOCATION>**
**Description:**  For applications that require time zone data categorized by country or location, this endpoint is the answer. You can fetch time zones specific to a country or location, making it easier to provide localized time-related services in your application.

api_list.name: Get Time Zone By Short Code
api_list.description:
**Endpoint: /api/v1/code?code=<SHORT CODE>**
**Description:**  When you have a specific short code representing a time zone, this endpoint allows you to retrieve comprehensive information about that time zone. Whether you're building a world clock application or need precise time zone data, this endpoint offers the details you require.

api_list.name: Get Time Zones
api_list.description:
**Endpoint: /api/v1/timezones**
**Description:**  This endpoint returns a set of random 20 time zones from the extensive database. Whether you need diverse time zones for testing or just a random selection, this endpoint provides the flexibility you need.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://world-time-zones-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/timezones"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "world-time-zones-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://world-time-zones-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/timezones"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "world-time-zones-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
